knimeNode.name: biomaRt Annotator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds some annotations from the BioMart databases using the biomaRt R package.

fullDescription.intro: Adds some annotations from the BioMart databases using the biomaRt R package. There must be a running RServe instance (on default port) on the machine running R. Details here.
fullDescription.option: The selected dataset from the database
The attributes to add to the results

ports.inPort: Any kind of input table which has a geneID column
ports.outPort: The same as the input table with the annotations from biomart.
